fn.p: Author Contributions D.M.S.: primary text writer, all statistical analyses and associated graphics, assisted in shoreline analysis using USGS Digital Shoreline Analysis System, assisted in development of conceptual protection/restoration plan for the Tangier Islands. K.L.D.: Primary GIS mapping specialist, primary user of USGS Digital Shoreline Analysis System, assisted in statistical analyses. M.H.H.: Primary designer of conceptual protection/restoration plan for the Tangier Islands. All have reviewed the draft manuscript.
